articles.title: NASA maps damage caused by Beirut blast using satellite data - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On the map, dark red pixels – like those present at and around the Port of Beirut – represent the most severe damage.
articles.content:
NASA has used satellite-derived data to map the likely extent of devastation caused by the August 4 explosion in Beirut which killed at least 163 people.
